attributes.action: Change the definition of rape from Penetration to unwillingful sex with someone
attributes.background: Currently, The definition of sex is Penetration of someone. With this logic, it makes it almost impossible for a women to rape. This must be adjusted so both genders can be accused for it

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556250
